name: Lunar Station
description:
A terrifying Darkness is at your doorstep.

Trapped inside the Lunar Station, you must run for your life.

This is a short game which takes about 15-30 minutes to complete.

(use the arrow keys to move, 'P' or 'ESC' to pause, and 'Z' to interact with objects).

Please be patient with the loading screen. If the bar is full for a long time and nothing happens, just refresh the page.

We would like to improve this game and to get better at making games, so your opinion is very important to us :)

Thanks!
